meanings.sent1: The behemoth stomped through the forest, shaking the ground.
meanings.sent2: The behemoth of a bear stood on its hind legs, towering over the campers.
meanings.sent3: The behemoth squirrel tried to hide an entire acorn in its mouth.
meanings.sent4: The behemoth storm cloud loomed ominously over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The behemoth whale breached the surface, spraying water into the air.

meanings.definition: Something of great size or power
meanings.sent1: The skyscraper was a behemoth in the city skyline.
meanings.sent2: The ancient castle was a behemoth of stone and history.
meanings.sent3: The behemoth of a sandwich was too big to fit in his mouth.
meanings.sent4: The behemoth of a machine hummed with immense power.
meanings.sent5: The behemoth of a tree cast a wide shadow over the meadow.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is extremely large or powerful
meanings.sent1: The CEO was a corporate behemoth, leading the industry with authority.
meanings.sent2: The behemoth of a truck rumbled down the highway, carrying heavy cargo.
meanings.sent3: The behemoth of a toddler tried to lift the giant toy all by himself.
meanings.sent4: The behemoth of a mountain loomed in the distance, challenging climbers.
meanings.sent5: The behemoth of a machine roared to life, ready to tackle any task.
